casebody.data:
GRIEF BROS. CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. AMERICAN CONTAINERS, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 04-1023. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 6, 2004. Gerard T. Gallagher, Principal Attorney, Baker & Daniels, South Bend, IN, David P. Irmscher, of Counsel, Baker & Daniels, Fort Wayne, IN, for Defendant-Appellee. William H. Oldach, III, Principal Attorney, Vorys, Sater, Washington, DC, Robert J. Palmer, of Counsel, May, Oberfell, South Bend, IN, for Plaintiff-Appellant.

Before RADER, Circuit Judge, FRIEDMAN, Senior Circuit Judge, and DYK, Circuit Judge.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
